sentences.sContent: One consequence of this is that a number of pillars of business orthodoxy are being eroded.
sentences.sContent_eng: One consequence of this is that a number of pillars of business orthodoxy are being eroded.
sentences.sCn: 这引发的一个后果就是，一些核心的正统商业思想逐渐受到腐蚀。

sentences.sContent: If you simplify your English, you are freed from the worst follies of orthodoxy.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you simplify your English, you are freed from the worst follies of orthodoxy.
sentences.sCn: 如果你简化你的英语，你就不会有正统说教的最蠢笨的做法。
